title: The Great British Bake Off 2019: Alice v Steph v David – who will win?
text:
On your marks. Get set. And, for one last time, bake! Yes, we’ve reached the gala grand final of The Great British Bake Off (8pm, Channel 4).

Over the past nine weeks, a baker’s dozen of 13 hopefuls have been whittled down to just three – but only one can be crowned. The trio will now enter doughy battle over the ultimate chocolate cake, twice-baked Stilton soufflés and a deliciously deceptive, visually illusory Showstopper.

Expect tears, family dramas and one almighty disaster. But who will succeed reigning champion Rahul Mandal and become the contest’s 10th winner?

Here’s our guide to the floury-handed runners and apron-clad riders…

Alice Fevronia: the dark horse

Who: The 28-year-old geography...
